Text: RE Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsThanks Marie Marie nroncom To Office cc Subject RE Master Netting Agreement Assignments PM Hi Athena Here is the information you requested Navajo Refining Company co Holly Corporation Crescent Court Suite Dallas Texas Louis Dreyfus Energy Services LP Louis Dreyfus Corporation I dont know if Louis Dreyfus Corporation is the same as the Dreyfus Corporation Louis Dreyfus Corporation is located in Wilton Connecticut Let me know if you need anything else Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From Athena Alexander ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Heard Marie Subject Re Master Netting Agreement Assignments Hi Marie hope all is well In order to complete our conflicts checks on two counterparties we need answers to the following questions Exactly which Navajo and Louis Dreyfus entitiessubsidiaries will be involved in the Master Netting Agreements Is the Louis Dreyfus on your list the same as the Dreyfus Corporation What is the main business address for Navajo Thanks and please call with any questions Best Regards Athena Heard Marie To Aronowitz Alan MarieHeard Alan Counterparty InformationHi Marie hope all is well In order to complete our conflicts checks on two counterparties we need to know exactly which Williams and British Energy Power and Energy Trading Limited entitiessubsidiaries will be involved in the Master Netting Agreements Please let me know Also going forward we will need this type of information for any new counterparties added to the current list Thanks and please call with any questions Best Regards Athena PS Please send me your telephone number Thanks NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate the information Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus or other defect that might affect any computer system into which it is received and opened it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use
